sentences.en: All the people in the synagogue were furious when they heard this.

sentences.en: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath, and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks.
sentences.cn: 每逢安息日，保罗在会堂里辩论，劝化犹太人和希腊人。

sentences.en: Departing from there, He went into their synagogue.
sentences.cn: 耶稣离开那里, 进了他们的会堂.

sentences.en: Every Sabbath he reasoned in the synagogue, trying to persuade Jews and Greeks.

sentences.en: For he loves our nation, and he himself built the synagogue for us.

sentences.en: In France, 2001, what makes someone set fire to a synagogue?

sentences.en: Like her siblings, Jenny was enrolled in our synagogue's religious school.

sentences.en: Many Jews come to this synagogue on Saturday.

sentences.en: One night, in desperation, I dragged my friend Joe to a synagogue, during the service.

sentences.en: Some of our neighbors belong to the synagogue.

sentences.cn: 远东最大的犹太教堂就坐落在江宁社区.

sentences.en: The only reason we leafleted on the Jewish New Year was because more people than usual go to the synagogue on that day.
sentences.cn: 我们在犹太新年派传单，纯粹是因为那天去犹太教堂的人比平日多。
